tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Claims (
    claim_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_amount DECIMAL,
    claim_date DATE,
    customer_id INT,
    is_fraud BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE ExternalDatabases (
    db_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    db_name VARCHAR(255),
    db_type VARCHAR(50),
    last_updated TIMESTAMP
)

CREATE TABLE CrossReference (
    ref_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT,
    db_id INT,
    match_score DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE fraud_detection (
    detection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT,
    database_id INT,
    detection_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (claim_id) REFERENCES claims(claim_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (database_id) REFERENCES external_databases(database_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_warnings (
    warning_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    detection_id INT,
    warning_message VARCHAR,
    warning_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (detection_id) REFERENCES fraud_detection(detection_id)
);

CREATE TABLE fraud_cases (
    case_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    claim_id INT,
    customer_id INT,
    detection_date DATETIME,
    fraud_description TEXT
);
